short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your favourite Poki Games in one place

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily Bookmark and Track Your Favorite Games on Poki.com
Are you tired of losing track of your favorite games on Poki? With Pokilist: Game Tracker & Bookmark Manager, you can now bookmark specific game pages and effortlessly keep track of the games you or your kids love to play. Inspired by a request from my son, this extension is perfect for anyone who wants to save and track their Poki gaming history without the need for an account.

Key Features:

Bookmark and organize your favorite Poki games with one click.
Automatically track your game history—see which games you've played and when.
No need for a Poki.com account—save your game progress directly and locally in your browser.
Fast, lightweight, and easy-to-use interface designed for gamers of all ages.

Why Use This Extension?
Poki.com doesn’t offer account logins to track your favorite games, making it difficult to remember which games you've played or loved. With Pokilist: Game Tracker & Bookmark Manager, you can now create a personalized library of games you’ve enjoyed and easily access them anytime. This extension helps both kids and parents maintain a game history, making replaying favorite games a breeze.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a parent wanting to help your child keep track of their game preferences, this extension provides a simple solution.

How It Works:

Visit your favorite game on Poki.com and click the "Love" button besides the Like Button.
The extension will automatically add the game to your bookmarks.
Revisit and manage your bookmarked games in one place. Check your gaming history to see the games you’ve recently played.

Boost Your Gaming Experience on Poki with Poki Game Tracker & Bookmark Manager!
